page.title: 06The Brownies
page.content: At Brownies we play lots of games. In winter we play "Murder in the Dark". Our leader, (we call her Brown Owl), tells one of us to play the murderer, but we are not to tell anyone else. She then turns the light out; the murderer pretends to kill someone, who screams and lies down dead. Then the light is put on. Then a detective has to question everybody. Only the murderer is allowed to tell fibs. The detective must guess the murderer but is only allowed three guesses. On Remembrance Sunday we march to the War Memorial and join in a Service with scouts, cubs, brass band and British Legion.
